Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Quick Summarizations in eDiscovery
Description:
Introducing the "Quick Summarization" feature for eDiscovery in Purview Copilotâ€”designed to streamline case management with an intuitive, at-a-glance overview. This new capability allows users to quickly access a comprehensive summary of eDiscovery cases, holds, and searches, eliminating the need to navigate through multiple tabs to assess status, statistics of completed actions, pending tasks, and ongoing jobs.

The "Quick Summarization" feature consolidates this information into a single, easy...
